content: this legal text provides a summary of a legal case involving two parties the case revolves around the division of assets between a couple the court has declared the dissolution of their partnership and ordered the division of their properties including an apartment and a garage a professional will be appointed to sell these properties the court also ordered one party to pay a sum of money to the other party and rejected any additional claims the court concluded its decision on august 6 2014 and the judges original order was filed electronically with a digital signature
